conversation.content:
- 'id': a5b9528ceb5a40798efbac5f8
  'name': Reward Inquiry
  'description': The user wants to know about the rewards for successful
    referrals.
  'entity':
    3cc7a7e1817d4525baffb26ae:
      'attribute-name': reward_type
      'description': The type of reward for successful referrals.
      'required-values':
      - monetary
      - gift card
      - additional PTO
      - company merchandise
- 'id': 760d15d64ded425692b032997
  'name': Referral FAQs
  'description': The user wants to view frequently asked questions about
    the referral process.
  'entity':
    114054d39b284ed0b42cbe00b:
      'attribute-name': faq_topic
      'description': The specific topic of the frequently asked question about
        the referral process.
- 'id': 346bb9e3844544919c52ce2c1
  'name': Temporary Housing
  'description': The intent is to request assistance in finding temporary
    accommodation in the new location.
  'entity':
    db93ce8b85e24d2296d9d5152:
      'attribute-name': location
      'description': The city or area where the temporary housing is needed.
    dba196158993442ead5e1ca5a:
      'attribute-name': duration
      'description': The length of time the employee needs temporary housing.
    9f45974027a14beda8b839cf1:
      'attribute-name': housing_type
      'description': The type of temporary housing the employee prefers.
      'required-values':
      - apartment
      - house
      - corporate housing
      - extended stay hotel
    ef0f65eb8293406f88b3eb677:
      'attribute-name': amenities
      'description': Any specific amenities the employee requires in their
        temporary housing.
- 'id': c7bd7722651840d496126a2e4
  'name': Update Information
  'description': The intent is to alter the employee's personal and professional
    details in the HR system due to relocation.
  'entity':
    d5bc3d3fa682487da54942f23:
      'attribute-name': employee_id
      'description': The unique identifier for the employee in the HR system.
    ee8e46b5059b4a69853dac09a:
      'attribute-name': new_address
      'description': The employee's new residential address after relocation.
    eaf3748788ad45c69cfa175e8:
      'attribute-name': new_phone
      'description': The employee's new contact number after relocation.
    5a1469f12ca44db0a90ed3f23:
      'attribute-name': new_department
      'description': The new department the employee will be joining after
        relocation.
- 'id': de01429ce3484a6d9d40acf0b
  'name': none_of_the_above
  'description': None of the intents were matched
